global_view_mode.description: User view mode (global if true, per media otherwise).

user_source_mode.description: User source colour space mode (adjust from selected view if true).

default_builtin_ocio_config.description: Select which of the built-in OpenColorIO configs xSTUDIO should use if no user config is set. Note that this will NOT override colour management rules driven by pipeline integration plugins, if you have any installed, or the OpenColorIO Environment Variable if it is set.

user_builtin_ocio_config.description: Set an OpenColorIO config file to drive colour management here. This config will NOT override colour management rules driven by pipeline integration plugins, if you have any installed, or the OpenColorIO Environment Variable if it is set. If this is not set the fallback built-in OpenColorIO config will be used.

ocio_env_var.description: This field shows you the OCIO environment variable. If it is set it should point to an ocio config file on disk and it will serve as the default unless your "OpenColorIO Config File" is set or if you have pipeline integration plugins installed.
